sentences.sContent: I presume you're here on business.
sentences.sCn: 我想你是来这儿出差的吧。

sentences.sContent: "Had he been home all week?"—"I presume so."
sentences.sCn: “他整个星期都在家吗？”—“我想是。”

remMethod.val: pre(预先) + sum(抓住) + e → 预先抓住 → 推测， 假定

trans.tranCn: 推测， 假定； 认定
trans.tranOther: If you presume that something is the case, you think that it is the case, although you are not certain
